description:
#### This package has been deprecated. XAMPP will now be managed by individual packages that follow the PHP releases.

*Please use one of the links below to get the correct version for your project.*

* [XAMPP 7.2](https://chocolatey.org/packages/XAMPP-72)
* [XAMPP 7.3](https://chocolatey.org/packages/XAMPP-73)
* [XAMPP 7.4](https://chocolatey.org/packages/XAMPP-74)
* [XAMPP 8.0](https://chocolatey.org/packages/XAMPP-80)
* [XAMPP 8.1](https://chocolatey.org/packages/XAMPP-81)
summary: A free and open source web server stack, consisting of Apache, MySQL, PHP and Perl.
author: Bitnami
